name: Jafar
flavor_text:
Shan-Yu: "It looks like you're out of ideas."
Mulan: "Not quite!"
text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2 "ink" to play this on top of one of your characters named Jafar.)\nNow Where Were We?: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may draw a card.
